module.name: interconnect_non_planar_shape
module.keywords: module, interconnect shape, layered product, electrical, electronic, design intent, priority shape data, manifold shape

abstract.li: three dimensional manifold surface representation of an interconnect substrate;
placement of footprint and other planar feature definitions in a three dimensional manifold surface representation including changing the planar shape to a manifold shape.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of three dimensional shape data for an interconnect substrate using a manifold surface representation. It provides for the representation of the relationship between a planar shape as the source and a manifold surface shape as the target when placing a feature shape onto a manifold surface.

inscope.li: three dimensional manifold surface representation of an interconnect substrate;
items within the scope of application module Part template 2d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1716;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 3d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1727;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit non planar design view, ISO/TS 10303-1613.
